languages.text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical hit for the first time in the round, all damage from this hit is prevented.
After that, a blinded negative effect is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next turn.

Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all damage from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
每当装备者在每{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次遭到暴击时，抵消此次暴击造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
在此之后，装备者周围2格内所有角色都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}这一{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，直到装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者在每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次遭到{/g}暴击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}时，抵消此次暴击造成的所有伤害。
在此之后，装备者周围2格内所有角色都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}这一{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}，直到装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。

languages.text:
При получении первого критического попадания за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} персонаж игнорирует весь {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от этого {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}.
После этого на все цели в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг персонажа накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
При получении первого {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} персонаж игнорирует весь урон от этого попадания.
После этого на все цели в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг персонажа накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

При получении первого {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} персонаж игнорирует весь урон от этого попадания.
После этого на все цели в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг персонажа накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を受けた際、この攻撃の全ての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が防がれる。
その後、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、半径2セル以内の全てのキャラクターに負わせる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
自身が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を受けた際、同攻撃のダメージを無効にする。
その後自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、半径2セル以内の全てのキャラクターに{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を付与。

languages.text:
Cuando el portador sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, evita todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ese ataque.
Después, todos los personajes en un radio de 2 casillas del portador sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando el portador sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, evita todo el daño de ese ataque.
Después, todos los personajes en un radio de 2 casillas del portador sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger erstmals in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} erleidet, wird der gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieses Treffers vermieden.
Danach werden bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers alle Charaktere in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um den Träger mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}Negativeffekt{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} erleidet, wird der gesamte Schaden dieses Treffers vermieden.
Danach wird bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers auf alle Charaktere in einem 2-Zellen-Radius um den Träger ein {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}Negativeffekt{/g} angewendet.

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur subit un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} que devrait lui infliger ce coup sont évités.
Puis l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} est infligé à tous les personnages présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur subit un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les dégâts que devraient lui infliger ce coup sont évités.
Puis l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} est infligé à tous les personnages présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
